programme.title: My Heart Is Rest Assured
programme.desc: Ghaith, a UAE initiative, remains faceless yet omnipresent, extending a thousand helping hands to sustainably assist those in need indiscriminately, spreading goodwill to ease hearts and perpetuate ceaseless kindness. Ghayth.

programme.title: Divination
programme.desc: When Hassan, a car body repairman with formidable fighting skills, crosses paths with a singer on the run after witnessing a crime by a powerful figure, he is drawn into a fight to protect her and bring the truth to light. Abeer Sabry, Nisreen Amin.

programme.title: Ali Kelay
programme.desc: With a noble heart and steady courage, Ali Kelay gives his fight winnings to charity and oversees his adoptive father's auto parts business, though his rise creates enemies in the market and ignites jealousy within his family. Ahmed Al Awady, Dorra Zarrouq.

programme.title: Al Nouman's Daughter
programme.desc: In the heart of Damascus, a controlling tycoon traps his daughter in a gilded cage of love and obsession, while she schemes to break free, sparking darkly comic clashes between power and freedom. Salloum Haddad, Riam Kafarneh.

programme.title: Maximum Limit
programme.desc: When a massive amount of money is deposited into Sabah's bank account, she suddenly finds herself accused of money laundering. Between being pursued by a dangerous gang and facing social challenges, her marriage is put to the ultimate test. Rogena, Mohamed Al Qass.

programme.desc: An empire trembles when an assassination attempt strikes at its core, unraveling decades of carefully maintained peace, bringing old rivalries and dangerous secrets into the open, and compelling every member of the realm. Maged Al Masry, Khaled Al Sawy.

programme.title: Diaries Of An Eccentric Family
programme.desc: Abu Samel continues his efforts to fend off the problems caused by his family and neighbors, while rooftop gatherings give rise to new schemes and embarrassing situations unfold at the perfume shop. Reem Abdullah, Majed Mutrib Fawwaz.

programme.title: Last Words
programme.desc: Mohamed Al Essa, Mohamed Al Qass.

programme.title: Ramez and The Ultimate Level
programme.desc: Ramez Galal returns with a new set of pranks for Ramadan this year, where he hosts a group of entertainment and sports stars to put them through difficult challenges that test their composure. Ramez Galal.

programme.title: Malek Bel Tawila
programme.desc: Technology In a short, entertaining presentation of just a few minutes, Malik Al Rouqi narrates the stories of many influential figures in human history and the most prominent events throughout time easily and enjoyably. Malik El-Rouky, Malek Al Rouqi.

programme.title: Lessons From My Father
programme.desc: Ahmad Al Shugairi takes us on a journey through the corridors of memory, recalling his experiences with his father, who left a great impact on him that continues to guide him to this day. Ahmad Al Shugairi.

programme.title: In The Footsteps Of The Prophet
programme.desc: A group of children journeys to the Two Holy Mosques and sacred sites to discover key moments in the life of Prophet Muhammad during Ramadan and Hajj, experiencing his story firsthand. Jawad Al Swisry.

programme.title: Kingdom Trail
programme.desc: Travels Driving across the Kingdom, Bassam Al-Fifi travels between its cities and villages, uncovering the stories of its people and the beauty of its landscapes in a journey filled with adventure and spontaneous encounters. Bassam Al Faifi.

programme.title: Our Breakfast Is Unique
programme.desc: Chef Omar Al Watban presents a variety of Ramadan Iftar recipes every day, clearly and simply explaining the ingredients and preparation steps for viewers. Omar Al Watban.

programme.title: Hide And Seek

programme.desc: Ramez Galal returns with a new set of pranks for Ramadan this year, where he hosts a group of entertainment and sports stars to put them through difficult challenges that test their composure. Ramez Galal.

programme.title: Our Breakfast Is Unique
programme.desc: Chef Omar Al Watban presents a variety of Ramadan Iftar recipes every day, clearly and simply explaining the ingredients and preparation steps for viewers. Omar Al Watban.

programme.title: In The Footsteps Of The Prophet
programme.desc: A group of children journeys to the Two Holy Mosques and sacred sites to discover key moments in the life of Prophet Muhammad during Ramadan and Hajj, experiencing his story firsthand. Jawad Al Swisry.

programme.title: Kingdom Trail
programme.desc: Travels Driving across the Kingdom, Bassam Al-Fifi travels between its cities and villages, uncovering the stories of its people and the beauty of its landscapes in a journey filled with adventure and spontaneous encounters. Bassam Al Faifi.

programme.title: Malek Bel Tawila
programme.desc: Technology In a short, entertaining presentation of just a few minutes, Malik Al Rouqi narrates the stories of many influential figures in human history and the most prominent events throughout time easily and enjoyably. Malik El-Rouky, Malek Al Rouqi.

programme.title: Lessons From My Father
programme.desc: Ahmad Al Shugairi takes us on a journey through the corridors of memory, recalling his experiences with his father, who left a great impact on him that continues to guide him to this day. Ahmad Al Shugairi.

programme.title: Al Maghreb Prayer
programme.desc: Prayers Live feed of Al Maghreb prayer.

programme.title: Diary Of A Married Man
programme.desc: Abdullah hopes for a peaceful, stable life after marriage, yet sharing the family home with his wife forces him to navigate ongoing tensions and satisfy everyone, often at his own expense. Ibrahim Al Hajjaj, Fatma Al Sherif.

programme.title: Release
programme.desc: Wrongly accused of murdering his wife, Abbas Al Rayes is sentenced to fifteen years in prison. After his release, Abbas is consumed by a thirst for revenge and a desire for salvation. Amr Saad, Hatem Salah.

programme.desc: Debate An interactive space where fans share their passion for Saudi football by discussing league matches, talking about their favorite clubs, and exploring the history and meaning of championships. Abd Al Rahman Al Hamidy, Abd Al Rahman Al Hamidy.

programme.title: Girls' Mistake
programme.desc: A single mistake by one of his daughters shakes the stability of the entire family, and the father's harshness turns him into a nightmare. The daughters pay the price through marriage, until the mother finds the strength to stand up and protect her family. Elham Al Fadalah, Jamal Al Radhan.

programme.title: Al Jaradiyah Neighborhood
programme.desc: Saqr bin Suleiman's return to Al Jaradiyah seems to promise a peaceful new beginning, but behind his composed demeanor and quiet presence burns an unrelenting desire to avenge the loss of his parents. Mohamed Al Qass, Nirmeen Mohsen.

programme.title: Mrs. Monalisa
programme.desc: Monalisa believes she has found true happiness when she gets married and settles in Cairo, but her dreams soon fade when she discovers the truth about the man she married and her family, who traded her for money, opening the gates of hell wide before her. Mai Omar, Sawsan Badr.

programme.title: City Kitchen
programme.desc: A devoted chef's world crumbles when his daughter disappears, and in the frantic search for her, the family is thrown into chaos, testing their values, loyalties, and the very bonds that hold their family together. Amal Arafa, Maxim Khalil.

programme.title: Devastated
programme.desc: In the 1990s, Kuwait, Arif, and Dananir grapple with their rebellious children, blinded by wealth and consumed by greed. Caught between the parents' attempts to maintain family stability through love and the children's relentless pursuit of money, their family is on the verge of collapse. Dawood Hussein, Taif.

programme.title: The Beautiful And The Bad
programme.desc: Caught in a family locked in an old feud, a young woman seeks her own identity away from their control. She pursues a university education, where she meets a professor who believes destiny is made, not inherited. Humayun Saeed, Sajal Ali.

programme.title: Me Or You
programme.desc: A heartwarming love story unfolds between two complete opposites: an intelligent, book-loving, and academically successful girl with a pragmatic outlook on life and a carefree, easygoing guy who prefers to go with the flow. Fahad Mustafa, Hania Aamir, Emmad Irfani, Bushra Ansari, Jawed Sheikh, Naeema Naeem Butt, Badar Mehmood, Farhat Ishtiaq.

programme.title: Main Aurr Mrs Khanna
programme.desc: Samir and Raina's marriage gets ruined when Samir loses his job. When Samir travels to Singapore searching for wealth to gain back their life together, he returns with a good fortune but to find that Raina is about to marry another man. Will samir lose his beloved Riana or will fate have its words? Kareena Kapoor, Sohail Khan, Prem Soni, Prem Soni, Salman Khan, Preity G Zinta, Bappi Lahiri.

programme.title: Murder Mubarak
programme.desc: An unconventional detective investigates a murder, examining a variety of suspects. He immerses himself in their lives as an outsider, only to discover that things are not always as they seem. Pankaj Tripathi, Tisca Chopra, Sara Ali Khan, Vijay Varma, Karisma Kapoor, Homi Adajania, Anuja Chauhan, Suprotim Sengupta.

programme.title: Koffee With Karan
programme.desc: Karan invites all the celebrity couples for coffee and exploits the moment to ask about their personal life, providing the audience a deep look at the life of their favorite stars. Karan Johar, Karan Johar.

programme.title: She Looks Great
programme.desc: Priya lives in her family home with her mother and sisters. She suffers in her life and believes that there is no place for love in her, after her lover left her to marry her sister. Nakuul Mehta, Disha Parmar, Amit Singh Thakur, Rohan Kapoor, Alefia Kapadia, Jyoti Tiwari, Ekta Kapoor, Sahir Raza, Reena Aggarwal, Pranveer Singh.

programme.title: She Looks Great

programme.title: Radd
programme.desc: A complex and challenging dynamic unfolds between the hardworking and responsible Eman, the wealthy Salaar, and Zain, a stable man preparing for marriage. Just as Eman is about to marry Zain, things become complicated, and she falls in love with Salaar. Sheheryar Munawar, Hiba Bukhari.

programme.title: Munna Michael
programme.desc: Michael is a talented dancer but fired from his job because he's old between the other young dancers, so when he finds an abandoned baby on the street, his life totally changes. Tiger Shroff, Nidhhi Agerwal, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Sahil Anand, Joy Badlani, Sabir Khan, Vimi Datta.

programme.title: Jalebi
programme.desc: On a train trip from Mumbai to Delhi the book writer, Ashia meets her ex-husband with his family. It becomes an emotional-tear trip as they reflect on their past relationship. Pushpdeep Bhardwaj, Kausar Munir, Suhrita Sengupta, Rhea Chakraborty, Varun Mitra, Digangana Suryavanshi.

programme.title: As Much As The Love
programme.desc: Maryam, the successful businesswoman, faces an unexpected challenge. As secrets from her past emerge, threatening the stability of her life, she is left with only two choices: adapt to the new reality or surrender and lose everything. Nelly Karim, Sherif Salama.

programme.desc: A devoted father fights to overcome relentless crises that threaten his family's stability. As challenges escalate, he struggles to protect his loved ones and hold his family together with the least sacrifice. Abdullah Al Sadhan, Fakhriya Khamis.

programme.desc: In the 1930s, as a skilled pickpocket seeks a new path, fate leads him alongside a band of other pickpockets to fight the British occupation. programme.title: Is It Chemistry?
programme.desc: Naive Sultan lives a quiet, stable life, dreaming only of marrying his beloved, until a secret brother his late father kept hidden forces him into a dangerous world ruled by guns. Mustafa Gharib, Diab.

programme.title: Together
programme.desc: Ahlam and Ibrahim share a pure love, alive with warmth and truth, yet when being together means death and parting becomes the only hope for survival, they stand at the brink of an impossible choice. Ahmed Malek, Huda El Mufti.

programme.title: Release
programme.desc: Wrongly accused of murdering his wife, Abbas Al Rayes is sentenced to fifteen years in prison. After his release, Abbas is consumed by a thirst for revenge and a desire for salvation. Amr Saad, Hatem Salah.

programme.title: Your Egyptian Morning
programme.desc: It's interested in all aspects of life in Egypt, and it's keen to focus on positive values and highlight influential and effective role models in Egyptian society. Hisham Assi, Seham Saleh.

programme.title: From Heart To Heart
programme.desc: Religion Discussions on religious and social topics relevant to Egyptian households, featuring various guests from different fields to address viewers' questions. Eman Riyad.

programme.title: Mrs. Monalisa
programme.desc: Monalisa believes she has found true happiness when she gets married and settles in Cairo, but her dreams soon fade when she discovers the truth about the man she married and her family, who traded her for money, opening the gates of hell wide before her. Mai Omar, Sawsan Badr.

programme.title: Al Sharjah Morning
programme.desc: People The audience are on a daily date to immerse themselves in a wonderful UAE experience, engaging in heartfelt conversations about community matters and spreading joy with every smile. Rasha Matar , Muhamad AlFarajawy.

programme.title: Advisory Opinions
programme.desc: Religion Religious scholars respond to people inquiries from a religious perspective. It spots the light on the new phenomena in society and how should we treat them. Sheikh Dr. Aziz Farhan, Aziz Bin Farhan Al Anzy.

programme.title: The Arab's Divan
programme.desc: Debate Interviews with Arabic-speaking writers and poets to know more about their careers.

programme.title: My Journey
programme.desc: Travels Rashed Al Khazraji, an Emirati traveler, goes on varied adventures through Africa, Asia, and Europe. His goal is to immerse himself in the distinct cultures and traditions of these regions while discovering their remarkable and unexpected destinations.

programme.title: The Origin Of Letters
programme.desc: History An overview of Arabic calligraphy that traces its historical origins, highlights the main stages of its development, and presents the most famous script styles with a clear introduction to the defining features of each.

programme.title: Flavors In Sharjah
programme.desc: Show Chef Ahmed Darwish travels across the Emirate of Sharjah, exploring its stunning natural settings and transforming each location into an open kitchen where he creates irresistible, delicious dishes infused with freshness, creativity, and local spirit.

programme.title: In The Expanse Of Surah
programme.desc: Religion Simplified and attractive method to provide an interpretation of the meanings of the Holy Quran in the light of the rules of knowledge and in line with modern human thought. Moreover, there is a full description of every Surah of the Holy Quran. Mohammed Hassan Khalaf, Raed Al Dalati.

programme.title: Sharjah's Minarets
programme.desc: Culture Enjoy this magnificent tour in Sharjah, where many amazing minarets exist. Viewers can see their wonderful architecture and know the history behind building each minaret.

programme.title: Then I Was Guided
programme.desc: Religion Hosting persons newly converted to Islam, shedding light on the daily life of new Muslims in their societies and revealing their role in defending Islam.

programme.title: The Sent Goodness
programme.desc: Religion The Sharjah Charity Society takes the lead to help poor people and needy ones by doing different charitable projects around the world. yousef Shaaban.

programme.title: Al Qasimiya Schools
programme.desc: History From the heart of Africa, the documentary follows the journey of Al Qasimia University's Qur'an memorization schools, uncovering the students' stories and the educational mission that embodies Sharjah's commitment to spreading Qur'anic education.

programme.title: The Origin Of Letters

programme.title: Stories And Sciences
programme.desc: Nature Exploring local social issues through a blend of comedy and drama, highlighting both mistakes and positive aspects. Its aim is to provide insight and value through an engaging and relatable approach. Ibrahim Obaid Al Laghesh.

programme.title: Good Morning, Homeland
programme.desc: Show A wide variety of paragraphs that shed light on many interesting aspects like news, latest events, fashion, cooking, and arts. Zainab Al-Matroushi, Bashir Al-Abd, Zainab Al Matroushi.

programme.title: Documentary
programme.desc: Education An enjoyable journey showing the most powerful documentaries and the most prominent international documentary works, which add a great deal of knowledge mixed with fun and suspense.

programme.title: Tarek's Ladies
programme.desc: A severe struggle erupts between Rima and Maisa after Rima discovers that her husband is cheating on her, and he marries Maisa. While they try to end the other's marriage, they know a shocking surprise. Tarek Al Ali, Khaled Al Ajeerb, Metha Mohamed, Captain Reema, Rana Al-Shafey, Ahmed Al Saeed, Mahmoud Dawaima, Sara Swar Aldhahab, Shadi Kiwan, Maitha Mohammed, Reema Abdallah, Rana Al Shafey, Khaled Al Ajereb, Maitha mohammed.

programme.title: Your Health Is More Important
programme.desc: Show Offering a diverse range of content, from expert medical advice provided by doctors to intimate glimpses into Ramadan life shared by social media influencers, and inspiring narratives of Emirati achievement and female empowerment.

programme.title: As Much As The Love
programme.desc: Maryam, the successful businesswoman, faces an unexpected challenge. As secrets from her past emerge, threatening the stability of her life, she is left with only two choices: adapt to the new reality or surrender and lose everything. Nelly Karim, Sherif Salama.

programme.title: Gold Road
programme.desc: Following years spent in prison, Faiza is released to find herself in a world of wealth alongside Saad, who has built a vast empire from their last deal; a reality that threatens to shatter their children's lives. Khaled Radi Al Fadli, Ahmad Iraj, Shahd El Yasen.

programme.title: In Sin
programme.desc: Jood's world is upended when her traveling theatre troupe is struck by tragedy. As she navigates loss and injustice, she discovers a perilous secret that threatens everything. Maguy Bou Ghosn, Tony Issa.

programme.title: Cardamom And Saffron
programme.desc: In each episode, Zainab and Mrs. Maryam host a guest from an Arab country to make their country's most famous dishes. Each time, Mrs. Maryam prepares a new Emirati dish to introduce the Arab world to Emirati heritage. Zainab Al-Matroushi, Amna Al-Dhanhani, Zainab Al Matroushi.

programme.title: Your Health Is More Important
programme.desc: Show Offering a diverse range of content, from expert medical advice provided by doctors to intimate glimpses into Ramadan life shared by social media influencers, and inspiring narratives of Emirati achievement and female empowerment.

programme.desc: A secluded village suffers a devastating wolfs' attack, losing livestock. Despite the villagers' valiant efforts to defend their animals, the failed, compelling them to seek aid from beyond their borders. programme.title: Prophet Joseph
programme.desc: Since his birth, the messenger Yusuf and his father have a close relationship which leads to his spiteful brothers' jealousy. However, all of it changes when he comes to Egypt. Faraj Allah Shalhsor, Faraj Allah Shalhsor, Mostafa Zamany, Elham Hamidy.

programme.title: Setayesh
programme.desc: Taher falls in love with Stayish and goes to engage her but he couldn't because of the antagonism between the couples' families. Nargis Mohamdi, Sima Tirandaz, Hadith Meramini, Ghasem Zare, Yunus Bashiri, Saeed Soltani, Mona Anurizadeh.

programme.title: The Martyr Of Kufa (Imam Ali)
programme.desc: From a historical military perspective, Imam Ali's biography, particularly post-Othman bin Afan, highlights his complex leadership during a period of intense civil war, culminating in his martyrdom. Daryoush Argmand, Saeed Nakbor, Mohamed Reda Sherify Nia, Behzad Farahani, Ali-Asghar Hemmat, Dawoud Merbakry, Dawoud Merbakry.

programme.title: The Hidden
programme.desc: Within the historical setting of the city of Mastooran, approximately 500 years ago in ancient Iran, Mastooran experiences a collection of captivating and fantastical adventures. programme.title: Yavar
programme.desc: Despite his hatred for drugs and all types of addiction, a man working in the film industry finds himself surrounded by all the problems related to addiction; In addition to his son's desire to marry a girl whose father is an addict. Ali Shah Hatami.

programme.title: Relic Hunter
programme.desc: A university professor passionate about archaeology, she dedicates her time to adventures around the world, searching for artifacts and returning them to museums. Despite having assistants, she becomes embroiled in fierce conflicts with antiquities hunters. Gil Grant, Tia Carrere, Christien Anholt.

programme.title: Fainting
programme.desc: A widow doctor struggles with life after the death of his wife.His beliefs has been changed as he has doubts about the presence of God.The thing that will reflect many crisis into his life.

programme.desc: Childhood friends Ali and Karim open an auto repair shop in the city. Financial woes and disagreements test their friendship, but they find humour in quirky customers, learning the value of resilience and camaraderie. Jawad Mazabady, Seros Krjestani, Amir Ghafarmnsh.

programme.title: Mosses In The Kitchens Of Chefs
programme.desc: Cooking An exciting and interesting sea voyage that includes three countries: Japan, South Korea and France, to get information about the various edible mosses and how to use them in preparing different recipes and dishes.

programme.title: Temporary Shelters
programme.desc: Nature.

programme.title: Economic Innovation
programme.desc: Investigation Inspiring stories of people and groups who decided to turn to simple ideas to create low-cost but more sustainable tools and products, proving that innovation can be found in the simplest ideas.

programme.title: Japanese Dinner
programme.desc: Cooking After a celebrated career cooking for royalty and celebrities, the renowned Japanese chef Seiji Otani begins a new chapter, bringing traditional dishes into the homes of expatriate families combining authentic flavors with the warmth of home.

programme.title: The Power Of The Crowds: Mysterious Languages
programme.desc: Nature A group of renowned scientists and experts takes us on a unique journey to explore herd behavior in the animal kingdom. Using cutting-edge technology, researchers uncover the codes that govern the movement of these groups.

programme.title: Cuba.. From Columbus To Castro
programme.desc: People In a country known for many unrests and revolutions, Cuba is associated with many symbols such as socialism, the mafia, cigars, and others. On this expedition, let's explore the history of Cuba, from its discovery by Columbus to Fidel Castro.

programme.title: Threads Of Gold

programme.title: Shepherds Around The World

programme.title: Four Seasons In The Forests
programme.desc: Nature Different creatures interact with nature; some appear and others hide each season, providing variety in the forest.

programme.title: Temporary Walk
programme.desc: Nature Amid the growing threat to biodiversity from noise and light pollution, bold experiments are being conducted worldwide, revealing the impact of total darkness and complete silence on wildlife.

programme.title: The Battle For Survival In The Mediterranean
programme.desc: Nature Despite the dangers and threats to which marine creatures are exposed daily in the Mediterranean Sea due to factory and farm waste, these creatures struggle to survive through adaptation and biological evolution.

programme.title: In Love With Wild Horses
programme.desc: People An amazing journey through the enchanting nature of the North American continent, home to the Tsoulcotine people, known as the horse people because of their timeless and unique bond with horses.

programme.title: Amazing Solutions

programme.title: The Diabetes Battle In Australia

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Modern Science
programme.desc: Sciences Despite the progressive scientific developments in many fields, science remains baffled by unexpected cosmic phenomena such as solar storms. Research into many mysteries continues, but science must be prepared to deal with the discoveries' consequences.

programme.title: Protecting Sondong Cave
programme.desc: Nature A journey into the heart of Phong Nha-Ke Bang cave, located in northern Vietnam and listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. This cave, the largest in the world, is an extraordinary marvel, featuring a lake, forest, clouds, and a rare ecosystem.

programme.title: Secrets Of Mount Olympus

programme.title: Divination
programme.desc: When Hassan, a car body repairman with formidable fighting skills, crosses paths with a singer on the run after witnessing a crime by a powerful figure, he is drawn into a fight to protect her and bring the truth to light. Abeer Sabry, Nisreen Amin.

programme.title: Ali Kelay
programme.desc: With a noble heart and steady courage, Ali Kelay gives his fight winnings to charity and oversees his adoptive father's auto parts business, though his rise creates enemies in the market and ignites jealousy within his family. Ahmed Al Awady, Dorra Zarrouq.

programme.title: Al Nouman's Daughter
programme.desc: In the heart of Damascus, a controlling tycoon traps his daughter in a gilded cage of love and obsession, while she schemes to break free, sparking darkly comic clashes between power and freedom. Salloum Haddad, Riam Kafarneh.

programme.title: Maximum Limit
programme.desc: When a massive amount of money is deposited into Sabah's bank account, she suddenly finds herself accused of money laundering. Between being pursued by a dangerous gang and facing social challenges, her marriage is put to the ultimate test. Rogena, Mohamed Al Qass.

programme.title: Al Raey's Sons
programme.desc: An empire trembles when an assassination attempt strikes at its core, unraveling decades of carefully maintained peace, bringing old rivalries and dangerous secrets into the open, and compelling every member of the realm. Maged Al Masry, Khaled Al Sawy.

programme.title: Waves
programme.desc: Debate Discussing social and family issues to analyze risk factors and behavioral patterns that threaten family ties and community structures with the help of experts and researchers. Amira Mohamed, Alan Ghafry, Amira Mohamad.

programme.desc: Ghaith, a UAE initiative, remains faceless yet omnipresent, extending a thousand helping hands to sustainably assist those in need indiscriminately, spreading goodwill to ease hearts and perpetuate ceaseless kindness. Ghayth.

programme.title: Divination
programme.desc: When Hassan, a car body repairman with formidable fighting skills, crosses paths with a singer on the run after witnessing a crime by a powerful figure, he is drawn into a fight to protect her and bring the truth to light. Abeer Sabry, Nisreen Amin.

programme.desc: With a noble heart and steady courage, Ali Kelay gives his fight winnings to charity and oversees his adoptive father's auto parts business, though his rise creates enemies in the market and ignites jealousy within his family. Ahmed Al Awady, Dorra Zarrouq.

programme.desc: When a massive amount of money is deposited into Sabah's bank account, she suddenly finds herself accused of money laundering. Between being pursued by a dangerous gang and facing social challenges, her marriage is put to the ultimate test. Rogena, Mohamed Al Qass.
